rules.description: All states, over 50 to be routed to New Business Team
AZ, UT, NV, WY, ID, MT
CT, RI, NH, VT, ME, MA
IA, MN, ND, SD, NE, KS, MO
Used by InsideSales application to pass data for KPIs.

rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED( LeadSource ), AND(ISNEW(), NOT(ISPICKVAL( LeadSource ,"")) )) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.fullName: Lead Self Reported Fleet Size Update
rules.description: The workflow rule to track updates to self-reported fleet size
The workflow rule to update the system fleet size time stamp every time the field is changed

rules.formula: OR(Record_Owner__r.Profile.Name ='Reseller Partner Profile (No MDF)', Record_Owner__r.Profile.Name ='Reseller Partner Profile (MDF)', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hVeZ', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001gthr', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001gthw', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001h6aR', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hAsi', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001h50E', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001gti1',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hdEt',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hjj8',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hVTW',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hAs9', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001gucD',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hWQL',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001h9J6',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001ggOM',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001gti6', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000000uG5D',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hVUK',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hUdY',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001hazG',Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001gucN', Record_Owner__r.Id ='00G50000001jKzC',OwnerId ='00G50000001hjj8') && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

AND(Record_Owner__r.Profile.Name <>'Reseller Partner Profile (No MDF)', Record_Owner__r.Profile.Name <>'Reseller Partner Profile (MDF)', RecordTypeId ='01250000000QjAy', LEFT(OwnerId,3) <> '00G') && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Origin__c, "Omnitracs Mexico"), CreatedBy.Profile.Name <> "CNR Partner Profile", NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Dealer Portal")) )&& $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

tasks.description: This lead was generated as a response to a campaign. Call your lead within 5 business days. Update SFDC as follows: 1.Update the lead status based on the outcome of your call. 2.Update the task status as appropriate to monitor progress.
tasks.subject: Lead Follow-up

tasks.description: Form: Marketo form submitted by lead for immediate follow up
tasks.subject: Marketo form submitted
